title: Knight Moves
text: A knight is located at the (black) origin of an infinite chessboard. Letf(n)define the number of black squares the knight can reach after making exactlynmoves. Givenn(0 <=n<= 108), outputf(n).InputThe first line of the input contains a single integer T, the number of test cases (1 <= T <= 106). Each test case consists of a single positive integern.OutputFor each value ofnin the input, print a single line containing.ExampleInput:201Output:10
